results.title: Bitcoin Price Reclaims $71,000 as Institutions Buy the Dip and Retail Interest Surges

results.title: Bitcoin bear market not over? Trader sees BTC price 'real bottom' at $50K
results.description: Bitcoin price analysis stayed bearish on the outlook for BTC, predicting new macro lows in a repeat of the 2022 bear market.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Jack Dorsey’s Block may cut up to 10% of staff in business overhaul: Report
results.description: Analysts forecast Block to post $403 million in Q4 profit on $6.25 billion revenue, following a third quarter marked by strong gross profit growth but mixed market reaction.

results.title: ARK extends Coinbase selling streak with another $22M sale, adds Bullish
results.description: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest sold 134,472 Coinbase shares across three ETFs while buying over 393,000 shares of crypto platform Bullish.

results.title: Bitcoin under $70K gives institutions a ‘new crack of the apple’: Bitwise CEO
results.description: Bitcoin is in a bear market and is “getting swept up” with the rest of the macro assets, Bitwise CEO Hunter Horsley declared during a television interview.

results.title: Bithumb claws back 99.7% of overpaid Bitcoin, covers remaining shortfall
results.description: Bithumb says it has reclaimed most of the excess BTC credited during a promotional error and used company funds to cover 1,788 Bitcoin that had already been sold.

results.title: 'Massive consolidation' expected across crypto industry: Bullish CEO
results.description: The crypto industry is about to get a wakeup call, as many companies will realize "they don’t have businesses, they have products," says Bullish CEO Tom Farley.

results.title: Crypto retail investors are trying to 'meta-analyze' crypto crash: Santiment
results.description: Santiment said the increased use of “capitulation” among crypto users on social media could suggest the market bottom has already happened.

results.title: Over 23% of traders now expect interest rate cut at next FOMC meeting
results.description: The number of traders expecting a rate cut at the March Federal Open Market Committee meeting rose following fears of a hawkish Fed nominee.

results.title: CFTC expands payment stablecoin criteria to include national trust banks
results.description: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) revised a previous staff letter to reflect the regulations in the GENIUS stablecoin framework.

results.title: Japan's Crypto Industry Faces Critical Test Ahead of Snap Election
results.description: Japan heads to polls as crypto industry watches tax reform, stablecoin rules, and legal reclassification timelines.

results.title: Justin Bieber Paid $1.3 Million for a Bored Ape NFT. It's Now Worth $12K
results.description: Back when NFTs were hot, Justin Bieber dropped $1.3 million to join the Bored Ape Yacht Club. The Ethereum NFTs now start at just $12K.

results.title: President Trump Launches TrumpRx, Promising Lower Drug Prices: Is It Legit?
results.description: The White House is betting that a new cash-pay platform—built around blockbuster GLP-1 drugs—can pressure Big Pharma and bypass the middlemen who keep U.S. prices high.
